Documentation for Xfce ApplicationsÔÉÅ

Core ModulesÔÉÅ

  • Application Finder (xfce4-appfinder) ‚Äì Application to quickly run applications and commands

  • Configuration Storage System (xfconf) ‚Äì D-Bus-based configuration storage system

  • Desktop Manager (xfdesktop) ‚Äì Configure the desktop background image, icons, launchers and folders

  • Development Tools (xfce4-dev-tools) ‚Äì A set of scripts and m4/autoconf macros that ease build system maintenance.

  • Helper Applications (exo) ‚Äì Manage preferred applications and edit .desktop files

  • File Manager (thunar) ‚Äì The fast and easy to use file manager for the Xfce Desktop

  • Menu Library (garcon) ‚Äì Library used for menu implementation

  • Panel (xfce4-panel) ‚Äì Application launchers, window buttons, applications menu, workspace switcher and more

  • Power Manager (xfce4-power-manager) ‚Äì Manage power sources and power consumption of devices

  • Session Manager (xfce4-session) ‚Äì Save the state of your desktop and restore it on the next startup

  • Settings Manager (xfce4-settings) ‚Äì The Settings daemon which persists many Xfce settings

  • Thumbnail Service (tumbler) ‚Äì A D-Bus service for applications to request thumbnails for various URI schemes and MIME types

  • Utility Sharing Library (libxfce4util) ‚Äì Library used to share commonly used non-GTK+ utilities among the Xfce applications

  • Widget Sharing Library (libxfce4ui) ‚Äì Used to share commonly used Xfce widgets among the Xfce applications

  • Window Manager (xfwm4) ‚Äì Handles the placement of windows on the screen

ApplicationsÔÉÅ

  • CD Burning application (Xfburn) ‚Äì A simple CD/DVD burning tool.

  • Dictionary (xfce4-dict) ‚Äì allows you to search different kinds of dictionary services for words or phrases and shows you the results

  • File Search Utility (catfish) ‚Äì a versatile file search utility for the Xfce desktop

  • Image Viewer (ristretto) ‚Äì Image viewer for the Xfce desktop

  • Media player (parole) ‚Äì Media player for the Xfce desktop

  • Music Player Daemon (xfmpc) ‚Äì A graphical GTK+ Music Player Daemon (MPD) client focusing on low footprint

  • Notification service (xfce4-notifyd) ‚Äì Notification service for the Xfce desktop

  • Remote filesystem Utility (gigolo) ‚Äì A frontend to easily manage connections to remote filesystems.

  • Panel Profiles (xfce4-panel-profiles) ‚Äì A simple application to manage Xfce panel layouts

  • Screensaver Utility (xfce4-screensaver) ‚Äì A simple, secure screen saver and locker.

  • Screenshot application (xfce4-screenshooter) ‚Äì Take screenshots of your Xfce desktop

  • Taskmanager(xfce4-taskmanager) ‚Äì Easy to use task manager

  • Terminal Emulator (xfce4-terminal) ‚Äì Terminal emulator for the Xfce desktop

  • Text Editor (mousepad) ‚Äì A simple text editor for Xfce

  • Volume Control & Mixer (xfce4-mixer) ‚Äì A volume control application based on GStreamer & panel-plugin

  • Xfdashboard ‚Äì Provides a Gnome shell-like dashboard for Xfce

Take a look at the list of recommended applications for more light-weight applications, recommended by Xfce users.
